configuredProperties.specification: {"swagger":"2.0","host":"petstore.swagger.io","basePath":"/v2","schemes":["http"],"paths":{"/pet":{"post":{"operationId":"addPet","consumes":["application/xml"],"produces":["application/xml"],"security":[{"petstore_auth":["write:pets","read:pets"]}]},"put":{"operationId":"updatePet","consumes":["application/xml"],"produces":["application/xml"],"security":[{"petstore_auth":["write:pets","read:pets"]}]}},"/pet/findByStatus":{"get":{"operationId":"findPetsByStatus","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"status","in":"query","items":{"type":"string","default":"available","enum":["available","pending","sold"]},"collectionFormat":"multi"}],"security":[{"petstore_auth":["write:pets","read:pets"]}]}},"/pet/findByTags":{"get":{"operationId":"findPetsByTags","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"tags","in":"query","items":{"type":"string"},"collectionFormat":"multi"}],"security":[{"petstore_auth":["write:pets","read:pets"]}],"deprecated":true}},"/pet/{petId}":{"get":{"operationId":"getPetById","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"petId","in":"path"}],"security":[{"api_key":[]}]},"post":{"operationId":"updatePetWithForm","consumes":["application/x-www-form-urlencoded"],"produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"petId","in":"path"}],"security":[{"petstore_auth":["write:pets","read:pets"]}]},"delete":{"operationId":"deletePet","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"petId","in":"path"}],"security":[{"petstore_auth":["write:pets","read:pets"]}]}},"/pet/{petId}/uploadImage":{"post":{"operationId":"uploadFile","consumes":["multipart/form-data"],"produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"petId","in":"path"}],"security":[{"petstore_auth":["write:pets","read:pets"]}]}},"/store/inventory":{"get":{"operationId":"getInventory","produces":["application/xml"],"security":[{"api_key":[]}]}},"/store/order":{"post":{"operationId":"placeOrder","produces":["application/xml"]}},"/store/order/{orderId}":{"get":{"operationId":"getOrderById","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"orderId","in":"path","maximum":1E+1,"minimum":1}]},"delete":{"operationId":"deleteOrder","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"orderId","in":"path","minimum":1}]}},"/user":{"post":{"operationId":"createUser","produces":["application/xml"]}},"/user/createWithArray":{"post":{"operationId":"createUsersWithArrayInput","produces":["application/xml"]}},"/user/createWithList":{"post":{"operationId":"createUsersWithListInput","produces":["application/xml"]}},"/user/login":{"get":{"operationId":"loginUser","produces":["text/plain"],"parameters":[{"name":"username","in":"query"},{"name":"password","in":"query"}]}},"/user/logout":{"get":{"operationId":"logoutUser","produces":["application/xml"]}},"/user/{username}":{"get":{"operationId":"getUserByName","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"username","in":"path"}]},"put":{"operationId":"updateUser","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"username","in":"path"}]},"delete":{"operationId":"deleteUser","produces":["application/xml"],"parameters":[{"name":"username","in":"path"}]}}},"securityDefinitions":{"api_key":{"type":"apiKey","name":"api_key","in":"header"},"petstore_auth":{"type":"oauth2","authorizationUrl":"http://petstore.swagger.io/oauth/dialog","flow":"implicit","scopes":{"read:pets":"read your pets","write:pets":"modify pets in your account"}}}}

description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.
name: Swagger Petstore

authenticationParameterName.description: Name of the API key parameter

authenticationParameterPlacement.displayName: Placement of the API key parameter

authenticationParameterValue.description: Value of the API key authentication parameter

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the API
authenticationType.label: producer

basePath.description: API basePath for example /v2. Default is unset if set overrides the value present in OpenAPI document.
basePath.label: producer

host.description: Scheme hostname and port to direct the HTTP requests to in the form of https://hostname:port.
host.label: producer
